name: Frog Story!
description:
When Prince Oran transforms into a frog and gets flushed out of the castle, it's up to his secret bestie Fern to mount a daring rescue! Made for NDJam 7.

This interactive story features hand-drawn art, hand-typed prose, hand-coded code, and a human hand! There's also some singing, whistling, and humming.

Note about the minigames: don't worry if you lose! The story continues just the same.

Note about the ending: there's only one. And clicking "Exit game" will actually RESTART the game. Whoopsie-doodles!
